sentences.sContent: I followed him to this island chateau where he's holding a party.
sentences.sContent_eng: I followed him to this island chateau where he's holding a party.
sentences.sCn: 我跟踪他来到这座岛上城堡。他将在这里举办宴会。

sentences.sContent: After lunch there will be a walk in the grounds of the chateau to see the Jugendstil nymph fountains, a work dating from 1903 by Walter Schott.
sentences.sContent_eng: After lunch there will be a walk in the grounds of the chateau to see the Jugendstil nymph fountains, a work dating from 1903 by Walter Schott.
sentences.sCn: 午餐后，萨奥尔一行将在城堡四周“漫步”，参观（雕刻大师）沃尔特·肖特1903年的作品--德国“青年派”风格女神雕像喷泉。

sentences.sContent: So, he actually owned for a short time this huge chateau, and other relatives and friends lived in estates surrounding theirs.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, he actually owned for a short time this huge chateau, and other relatives and friends lived in estates surrounding theirs.
sentences.sCn: 他只拥有这个巨大的城堡一段很短的时间，其他的亲戚朋友的房子都挨的很近。

synos.tran: （法国封建时代的）城堡；（尤指法国的）别墅

trans.tranOther: a castle or large country house in France
